ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IsBillable__c = true && (ProjectId__c = 'a3q1p000000kSaM' || ProjectId__c = 'a3q1p000000kSo4' || ProjectId__c = 'a3q1p000000kSag' || ProjectId__c = 'a3q1p000000kSaW' || ProjectId__c = 'a3q1p000000kSnp')
